message: Your cut was a little high. Let's be reasonable, this is a fair split.
I can go a bit lower, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
I'm making a concession, but this has to be close to the limit. Time is running out.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours, let's make a deal
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
